properties.entry: SELECT * FROM MEMBER WHERE MEM_ID = ? AND MEM_PWD = ? AND MEM_STATUS = 'N'
INSERT INTO MEMBER(MEM_NO, MEM_ID, MEM_PWD, MEM_NAME, PHONE, EMAIL, GENDER, BIRTH_DATE) VALUES(SEQ_MEM_NO.NEXTVAL, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
SELECT MEM_ID FROM MEMBER WHERE MEM_NAME = ? AND PHONE = ? AND MEM_STATUS = 'N'
SELECT MEM_PWD FROM MEMBER WHERE MEM_ID = ? AND MEM_NAME = ? AND PHONE = ? AND MEM_STATUS = 'N'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER WHERE MEM_ID = ?
SELECT MEM_NO, GR_CODE, MEM_ID, MEM_PWD, MEM_NAME, PHONE, EMAIL FROM MEMBER WHERE MEM_NO= ?
UPDATE MEMBER SET MEM_STATUS = 'Y' WHERE MEM_NO = ?
UPDATE MEMBER SET GR_CODE = ? , MEM_PWD = ? , MEM_NAME = ? , PHONE = ? , EMAIL = ? WHERE MEM_NO = ?
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER WHERE MEM_NAME LIKE '%' || ? || '%'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER WHERE PHONE LIKE '%' || ? || '%'

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM (SELECT MEM_NO, GR_NAME, MEM_ID, MEM_PWD, MEM_NAME, GENDER, EMAIL, TO_CHAR(BIRTH_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') BIRTH_DATE, PHONE, ENROLL_DATE, MEM_STATUS FROM MEMBER JOIN GRADE USING (GR_CODE) ORDER BY MEM_NO )A) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

AND ?
